macro.name: IFREADONLY
macro.description: Whether device is readonly. Set to # for readonly, default is ' ' (just spacebar), for read and write

macro.name: HVCAENIP0
macro.description: IP address of the first device.

macro.name: HVCAENIP1
macro.description: IP address of the second device.

macro.name: HVCAENIP2
macro.description: IP address of the third device.

macro.name: HVCAENIP3
macro.description: IP address of the fourth device.

macro.name: HVCAENIP4
macro.description: IP address of the fifth device.

macro.name: HVCAENIP5
macro.description: IP address of the sixth device.

macro.name: HVCAENIP6
macro.description: IP address of the seventh device.

macro.name: HVCAENIP7
macro.description: IP address of the eighth device.

macro.name: HVCAENSYSTYPE0
macro.description: System type of the first device.

macro.name: HVCAENSYSTYPE1
macro.description: System type of the second device.

macro.name: HVCAENSYSTYPE2
macro.description: System type of the third device.

macro.name: HVCAENSYSTYPE3
macro.description: System type of the fourth device.

macro.name: HVCAENSYSTYPE4
macro.description: System type of the fifth device.

macro.name: HVCAENSYSTYPE5
macro.description: System type of the sixth device.

macro.name: HVCAENSYSTYPE6
macro.description: System type of the seventh device.

macro.name: HVCAENSYSTYPE7
macro.description: System type of the eighth device.
